answers.answer: If it's early than 41 weeks I'd wait. Many c-sections are a result of inducing too early.
I'm only 29weeks but my doctor (also delivered all my mother's children)  will let you chose to be induced once you hit 37weeks as long as everything looks good

I chose to be induced, but my doctor agreed because I had gestational diabetes and he was already slightly concerned with my son being too big. Our induction was only 2 days before the due date. I would wait if you can though, I ended up having a :-)section. I can't say it was from induction or from my son being too big though.

question: What is your opinion on being induced?
title: Thinking about being induced
